turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I got to buy some pizzas today from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Four large pizzas. Let's get one of them with pepperoni and pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get one of them.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they still have the five-cheese blend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, it looks like they are still offering that specialty pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let's get one of those.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get the Mexican pizza and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one regular pizza with,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tomatoes and

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: olives and green peas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they have a taco pizza but not a mexican pizza, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got the taco pizza. Let me ask her.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the difference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a taco pizza has hot sauce, ground beef, american cheese, and corn.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: over. So, now like No, they don't have taco shells on them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no they do not.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let's go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me confirm your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni and pineapple, 1 5 cheese blend, 1 taco pizza, and 1 with tomato, olives, and ground beef.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, and we need extra cheese on every pizza. On every pie for extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, there will be an additional charge, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will come out to $98, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: God.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, will you be dining-in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me see when these pizzas will be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, your receipt will be texted to you, just show it at the counter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
